review: For the cost, it does exactly what I need. My kids love it as it is easy for them to use and maneuver. I won't do  a technical review as I have nothing to compare it to, but the simplicity is a deal breaker compared to other products I've read review for. I'm very satisfied, and after the first one worked out so well, I bought 2 more for our other TVs.

review: This device freezes up more than actual shows are streamed.  I spend more time resetting it than I actually spend enjoying watching anything.  When it actually is working and I utilize my promo subscription of Sling TV (on the rare occasion it will load) I am constantly waiting on programs to buffer or am kicked out.  I subscribe to both HULU and Netflix and have never had any issues, so I know this is not a network problem.Very poor quality device partnered with even poorer quality tv streaming subscription ( SLING TV). I will be returning this device, canceling the subscription and spending the extra money on an Apple TV.  What they say is true "you get what you pay for".
author: Jessica
